Name: Stela fragment
Description: The upper part of a round-topped stela with a scene at the top and four horizontal bands of text remaining. At the top is an offering table heavily laden with food and with jars underneath. On either side are figures, to the right is a female holding a lotus flower, behind her is what remains of another. Opposite is a seated male wearing a short wig, his left arm folded across his breast. There is possibly another figure behind him but is indistinguishable. Above the offering table and the figure to the right is a small inscription.Below is a htp-dj-nsw formula that also invokes the god Ptah.
